      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setUp()
      SetUp Default Method This class prepare an instance of any PublicObjectiveCard, create a Player with an associate Grid and PrivateObjectiveCard, so proceed to run the computation of the score
      void tearDown()
      TearDown Method This method sets up the class to a clear and new test ambient
      void testCalcScore()
      CalcScore Tester This method verifies the correct total score of the player.
      void testFreeCellsCounter()
      FreeCells Tester This test ensure that the method returns the correct number of free cells in the Player's grid
      void testPrivateObjectiveCounter()
      PrivateScore Tester This test verifies that the computed PrivateScore is correct
      void testPublicObjectiveCounter()
      PublicObjective Counter Tester This test verifies that all the classes used to compute the public score works properly.

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        SetUp Default Method This class prepare an instance of any PublicObjectiveCard, create a Player with an associate Grid and PrivateObjectiveCard, so proceed to run the computation of the score
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there are problems in creating the Grid or the Player

      • tearDown

        public void tearDown()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        TearDown Method This method sets up the class to a clear and new test ambient
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if is not possible to clear the test ambient

      • testCalcScore

        public void testCalcScore()
        CalcScore Tester This method verifies the correct total score of the player. Now is cumulative of all the PublicObjectivePlayers Scores. As publicObjectiveCounter will be implemented it will check the real score with only 3 PublicObjectiveCards

      • testPrivateObjectiveCounter

        public void testPrivateObjectiveCounter()
        PrivateScore Tester This test verifies that the computed PrivateScore is correct

      • testFreeCellsCounter

        public void testFreeCellsCounter()
        FreeCells Tester This test ensure that the method returns the correct number of free cells in the Player's grid

      • testPublicObjectiveCounter

        public void testPublicObjectiveCounter()
        PublicObjective Counter Tester This test verifies that all the classes used to compute the public score works properly.
